name: Quality Inn Kenai

reviews.text: We spent 9 nights in Alaska touring the Denali area, Homer, Seward, Cooper Landing & Kenai - Soldotna area. This hotel was perfect for our needs. What I look for in a hotel is: cleanliness, comfortable beds; good location; and a clean bathroom. this hotel had all of the above. The location was very good just off the Kenai Spur Rd with a really nice Wal-Mart behind the hotel. We had a room with 2 comfortable queen beds and had plenty of room for 3 large suitcases, a cooler etc. There were plenty of pillows and towels. It had the standard amenities- a refrigerator, coffee maker, hair dryer etc. The only negative is that it does not have AC which we didn't need but the temperature never got above 65'. It did have a fun which was sufficient. The staff was friendly, helpful and efficient. The breakfast was an extra plus. There were scrambled eggs & bacon as well as the standard continental breakfast items. We stayed here because we had Choice Hotel Points but I would definitely stay here again when in Kenai even if we didn't have free rewards. The location is perfect for a base.
reviews.title: A good choice while in Kenai

reviews.text: tip: Wal-Mart behind the Quality Inn is a great place to buy souveners
reviews.title: NO Air Conditioning!!!

reviews.text: Eat dinner at Louie's in the Uptown Motel just up the road on Kenai Spur for dinner
reviews.title: BASIC at best

reviews.text: Stop by the Kenai Visitor Center
reviews.title: Very accommodating! Great place!

reviews.text: Good service, clean, and great location. No air conditioning in this hotel! It is 85 degrees outside and they only provide a fan and a low dangerous window next to a parking lot. When we went into the room the heater was on in July! The pool and spa are nice. The breakfast is huge! Free waffles, cereal, bagels, donuts, scrambled eggs, breakfast sausage, bacon, toast, yogurt, coffee, tea, hot chocolate, hot apple cider, orange juice, apple juice, cranberry juice, and milk! There's also a fitness center and a business center. But I will not stay here again just because of the heat hitting you when you open the door. If you have a disability, make sure you notify the hotel because the second floor does not have an elevator.
reviews.title: Solid Quality Hotel

description: The Kenai Quality Inn, a business with the best hospitality and accomodations, has many features to offer. One of our best features is our hot continental breakfast buffet, inside our spacious breakfast room. You are welcome to make your own waffle, have juice, sausage, bacon, and much more comes with this complimentary, mouthwatering breakfast.We also offer free wireless internet, pool and spa, AND a large, free walk-in freezer space between May 1st and September 30th.**Our hotel is central with many restaurants, several grocery stores and department store, and great sidewalks for scenic strolls.**if you need the walk-in freezer before or after these dates just give us a notification in advance and we will gladly get it prepared for you.
